60c8e6d1a31776d27fb2cb23.commands:
apt-get update
apt-get upgrade -y
apt-get autoremove -y
60c8e6d1a31776d27fb2cb23.name: System Update

60c8e82fa31776d27fb2cb36.commands:
apt-get install python3 python3-pip git -y
mkdir /opt/theHarvester
git clone https://github.com/laramies/theHarvester.git /opt/theHarvester
python3 -m pip install -r /opt/theHarvester/requirements/base.txt
60c8e82fa31776d27fb2cb36.name: Install theHarvester

60c8ed03a31776d27fb2cb5b.commands:
apt-get install -y software-properties-common
apt-get install -y build-essential cmake pkg-config libglib2.0-dev libgpgme-dev libgnutls28-dev uuid-dev libssh-gcrypt-dev libldap2-dev doxygen graphviz libradcli-dev libhiredis-dev libpcap-dev bison libksba-dev libsnmp-dev gcc-mingw-w64 heimdal-dev libpopt-dev xmltoman redis-server xsltproc libical-dev postgresql postgresql-contrib postgresql-server-dev-all gnutls-bin nmap rpm nsis curl wget fakeroot gnupg sshpass socat snmp smbclient libmicrohttpd-dev libxml2-dev python3-polib gettext rsync xml-twig-tools python3-paramiko python3-lxml python3-defusedxml python3-pip python3-psutil python3-impacket virtualenv vim git
apt-get install -y libnet1-dev libunistring-dev libjson-glib-dev
apt-get install -y gcc cmake pkg-config libical-dev libglib2.0-dev postgresql-server-dev-12
apt-get install -y texlive-latex-extra --no-install-recommends
apt-get install -y texlive-fonts-recommended
curl -sS https://dl.yarnpkg.com/debian/pubkey.gpg | apt-key add -
echo "deb https://dl.yarnpkg.com/debian/ stable main" | tee /etc/apt/sources.list.d/yarn.list
apt-get update
apt-get install -y yarn
yarn install
yarn upgrade
60c8ed03a31776d27fb2cb5b.name: Install GVM Requirements

60c8ef59a31776d27fb2cb62.command: bash -c "cd /opt/gvm/src/gvm-libs && export PKG_CONFIG_PATH=/opt/gvm/lib/pkgconfig:$PKG_CONFIG_PATH && mkdir build && cd build && cmake -DCMAKE_INSTALL_PREFIX=/opt/gvm .. && make && make doc && make install"
60c8ef59a31776d27fb2cb62.name: Install gvm-libs

60c8efb4a31776d27fb2cb68.commands:
echo 'export PATH="$PATH:/opt/gvm/bin:/opt/gvm/sbin:/opt/gvm/.local/bin"' | tee -a /etc/profile.d/gvm.sh 
chmod 0755 /etc/profile.d/gvm.sh 
source /etc/profile.d/gvm.sh 
echo "/opt/gvm/lib" > /etc/ld.so.conf.d/gvm.conf
mkdir /opt/gvm
adduser gvm --disabled-password --home /opt/gvm/ --no-create-home --gecos ''
usermod -aG redis gvm
chown gvm:gvm /opt/gvm/
60c8efb4a31776d27fb2cb68.name: Create GVM User

60c8f007a31776d27fb2cb72.commands:
mkdir /opt/gvm/src/
git clone https://github.com/greenbone/gvm-libs.git /opt/gvm/src/gvm-libs/
git clone --branch openvas-21.04 https://github.com/greenbone/openvas.git /opt/gvm/src/openvas/
git clone --branch gvmd-21.04 https://github.com/greenbone/gvmd.git /opt/gvm/src/gvmd/
git clone https://github.com/greenbone/openvas-smb.git /opt/gvm/src/openvas-smb/
git clone --branch gsa-21.04 https://github.com/greenbone/gsa.git /opt/gvm/src/gsa/
git clone --branch ospd-openvas-20.08 https://github.com/greenbone/ospd-openvas.git /opt/gvm/src/ospd-openvas/
git clone --branch ospd-21.04 https://github.com/greenbone/ospd.git /opt/gvm/src/ospd/
git clone https://github.com/greenbone/pg-gvm.git /opt/gvm/src/pg-gvm/
60c8f007a31776d27fb2cb72.name: Git Clone GVM Source

60c8f339a31776d27fb2cb80.command: bash -c "cd /opt/gvm/src/openvas-smb && export PKG_CONFIG_PATH=/opt/gvm/lib/pkgconfig:$PKG_CONFIG_PATH && mkdir build && cd build && cmake -DCMAKE_INSTALL_PREFIX=/opt/gvm .. && make && make install"
60c8f339a31776d27fb2cb80.name: Install openvas-smb

60c8f4ffa31776d27fb2cb89.command: bash -c "cd /opt/gvm/src/openvas && export PKG_CONFIG_PATH=/opt/gvm/lib/pkgconfig:$PKG_CONFIG_PATH && mkdir build && cd build && cmake -DCMAKE_INSTALL_PREFIX=/opt/gvm .. && make && make doc && make install"
60c8f4ffa31776d27fb2cb89.name: Install openvas Scanner

60c8f619a31776d27fb2cb95.commands:
bash -c 'export LC_ALL="C" && ldconfig'
cp /etc/redis/redis.conf /etc/redis/redis.orig
cp /opt/gvm/src/openvas/config/redis-openvas.conf /etc/redis/
chown redis:redis /etc/redis/redis-openvas.conf
echo "db_address = /run/redis-openvas/redis.sock" > /opt/gvm/etc/openvas/openvas.conf
systemctl enable redis-server@openvas.service
systemctl start redis-server@openvas.service
sysctl -w net.core.somaxconn=1024
sysctl vm.overcommit_memory=1
echo "net.core.somaxconn=1024"  >> /etc/sysctl.conf
echo "vm.overcommit_memory=1" >> /etc/sysctl.conf
echo "[Unit]" > /etc/systemd/system/disable-thp.service
echo "Description=Disable Transparent Huge Pages (THP)" >> /etc/systemd/system/disable-thp.service
echo "" >> /etc/systemd/system/disable-thp.service
echo "[Service]" >> /etc/systemd/system/disable-thp.service
echo "Type=simple" >> /etc/systemd/system/disable-thp.service
echo "ExecStart=/bin/sh -c \"echo 'never' > /sys/kernel/mm/transparent_hugepage/enabled && echo 'never' > /sys/kernel/mm/transparent_hugepage/defrag\"" >> /etc/systemd/system/disable-thp.service
echo "" >> /etc/systemd/system/disable-thp.service
echo "[Install]" >> /etc/systemd/system/disable-thp.service
echo "WantedBy=multi-user.target" >> /etc/systemd/system/disable-thp.service
systemctl daemon-reload
systemctl start disable-thp
systemctl enable disable-thp
systemctl restart redis-server
sed 's/Defaults\s.*secure_path=\"\/usr\/local\/sbin:\/usr\/local\/bin:\/usr\/sbin:\/usr\/bin:\/sbin:\/bin:\/snap\/bin\"/Defaults secure_path=\"\/usr\/local\/sbin:\/usr\/local\/bin:\/usr\/sbin:\/usr\/bin:\/sbin:\/bin:\/snap\/bin:\/opt\/gvm\/sbin\"/g' /etc/sudoers | EDITOR='tee' visudo
echo "gvm ALL = NOPASSWD: /opt/gvm/sbin/openvas" > /etc/sudoers.d/gvm
echo "gvm ALL = NOPASSWD: /opt/gvm/sbin/gsad" >> /etc/sudoers.d/gvm
60c8f619a31776d27fb2cb95.name: Fix redis for OpenVas

60c8f9d7a31776d27fb2cbae.name: Upload Plugins in redis with OpenVas

60c8fa62a31776d27fb2cbb5.command: bash -c "cd /opt/gvm/src/gvmd && export PKG_CONFIG_PATH=/opt/gvm/lib/pkgconfig:$PKG_CONFIG_PATH && mkdir build && cd build && cmake -DCMAKE_INSTALL_PREFIX=/opt/gvm .. && make && make doc && make install"
60c8fa62a31776d27fb2cbb5.name: Install GVM Manager

60c8fafca31776d27fb2cbbb.commands:
createuser -DRS gvm
createdb -O gvm gvmd
psql gvmd -c "create role dba with superuser noinherit;"
psql gvmd -c "grant dba to gvm;"
psql gvmd -c 'create extension "uuid-ossp";'
psql gvmd -c 'create extension "pgcrypto";'
psql gvmd -c 'create extension "pg-gvm";'
60c8fafca31776d27fb2cbbb.name: Configure PostgreSQL

60c900a2a31776d27fb2cbf4.command: bash -c "cd /opt/gvm/src/pg-gvm && export PKG_CONFIG_PATH=/opt/gvm/lib/pkgconfig:$PKG_CONFIG_PATH && mkdir build && cd build && cmake -DCMAKE_INSTALL_PREFIX=/opt/gvm .. && make && make install"
60c900a2a31776d27fb2cbf4.name: Install pg-gvm

60c902b4a31776d27fb2cc19.commands:
greenbone-feed-sync --type GVMD_DATA
greenbone-feed-sync --type SCAP
greenbone-feed-sync --type CERT
60c902b4a31776d27fb2cc19.name: Update Feeds

60c903c6a31776d27fb2cc3e.command: bash -c "cd /opt/gvm/src/gsa && export PKG_CONFIG_PATH=/opt/gvm/lib/pkgconfig:$PKG_CONFIG_PATH && mkdir build && cd build/ && cmake -DCMAKE_INSTALL_PREFIX=/opt/gvm .. && make && make doc && make install && touch /opt/gvm/var/log/gvm/gsad.log"
60c903c6a31776d27fb2cc3e.name: Install gsa

60c9042ea31776d27fb2cc49.command: bash -c "cd /opt/gvm/src/ospd-openvas && export PKG_CONFIG_PATH=/opt/gvm/lib/pkgconfig:$PKG_CONFIG_PATH && pip3 install . && pip3 install paho-mqtt"
60c9042ea31776d27fb2cc49.name: Install ospd-openvas

60c905d1a31776d27fb2cc4f.commands:
chown gvm:gvm -R /opt/gvm/
echo "[Unit]" > /etc/systemd/system/gvmd.service
echo "Description=Open Vulnerability Assessment System Manager Daemon" >> /etc/systemd/system/gvmd.service
echo "Documentation=man:gvmd(8) https://www.greenbone.net" >> /etc/systemd/system/gvmd.service
echo "Wants=postgresql.service ospd-openvas.service" >> /etc/systemd/system/gvmd.service
echo "After=postgresql.service ospd-openvas.service" >> /etc/systemd/system/gvmd.service
echo "" >> /etc/systemd/system/gvmd.service
echo "[Service]" >> /etc/systemd/system/gvmd.service
echo "Type=forking" >> /etc/systemd/system/gvmd.service
echo "User=gvm" >> /etc/systemd/system/gvmd.service
echo "Group=gvm" >> /etc/systemd/system/gvmd.service
echo "PIDFile=/opt/gvm/var/run/gvmd.pid" >> /etc/systemd/system/gvmd.service
echo "WorkingDirectory=/opt/gvm" >> /etc/systemd/system/gvmd.service
echo "ExecStart=/opt/gvm/sbin/gvmd --osp-vt-update=/opt/gvm/var/run/ospd.sock" >> /etc/systemd/system/gvmd.service
echo "ExecReload=/bin/kill -HUP $MAINPID" >> /etc/systemd/system/gvmd.service
echo "KillMode=mixed" >> /etc/systemd/system/gvmd.service
echo "Restart=on-failure" >> /etc/systemd/system/gvmd.service
echo "RestartSec=2min" >> /etc/systemd/system/gvmd.service
echo "KillMode=process" >> /etc/systemd/system/gvmd.service
echo "KillSignal=SIGINT" >> /etc/systemd/system/gvmd.service
echo "GuessMainPID=no" >> /etc/systemd/system/gvmd.service
echo "PrivateTmp=true" >> /etc/systemd/system/gvmd.service
echo "" >> /etc/systemd/system/gvmd.service
echo "[Install]" >> /etc/systemd/system/gvmd.service
echo "WantedBy=multi-user.target" >> /etc/systemd/system/gvmd.service
echo "[Unit]" > /etc/systemd/system/gsad.service
echo "Description=Greenbone Security Assistant (gsad)" >> /etc/systemd/system/gsad.service
echo "Documentation=man:gsad(8) https://www.greenbone.net" >> /etc/systemd/system/gsad.service
echo "After=network.target" >> /etc/systemd/system/gsad.service
echo "Wants=gvmd.service" >> /etc/systemd/system/gsad.service
echo "" >> /etc/systemd/system/gsad.service
echo "[Service]" >> /etc/systemd/system/gsad.service
echo "Type=forking" >> /etc/systemd/system/gsad.service
echo "PIDFile=/opt/gvm/var/run/gsad.pid" >> /etc/systemd/system/gsad.service
echo "WorkingDirectory=/opt/gvm" >> /etc/systemd/system/gsad.service
echo "ExecStart=/opt/gvm/sbin/gsad --drop-privileges=gvm" >> /etc/systemd/system/gsad.service
echo "Restart=on-failure" >> /etc/systemd/system/gsad.service
echo "RestartSec=2min" >> /etc/systemd/system/gsad.service
echo "KillMode=process" >> /etc/systemd/system/gsad.service
echo "KillSignal=SIGINT" >> /etc/systemd/system/gsad.service
echo "GuessMainPID=no" >> /etc/systemd/system/gsad.service
echo "PrivateTmp=true" >> /etc/systemd/system/gsad.service
echo "" >> /etc/systemd/system/gsad.service
echo "[Install]" >> /etc/systemd/system/gsad.service
echo "WantedBy=multi-user.target" >> /etc/systemd/system/gsad.service
echo "[Unit]" > /etc/systemd/system/ospd-openvas.service
echo "Description=Job that runs the ospd-openvas daemon" >> /etc/systemd/system/ospd-openvas.service
echo "Documentation=man:gvm" >> /etc/systemd/system/ospd-openvas.service 
echo "After=network.target redis-server@openvas.service" >> /etc/systemd/system/ospd-openvas.service 
echo "Wants=redis-server@openvas.service" >> /etc/systemd/system/ospd-openvas.service 
echo "" >> /etc/systemd/system/ospd-openvas.service 
echo "[Service]" >> /etc/systemd/system/ospd-openvas.service 
echo "Environment=PATH=/opt/gvm/bin/ospd-scanner/bin:/opt/gvm/bin:/opt/gvm/sbin:/opt/gvm/.local/bin:/usr/local/sbin:/usr/local/bin:/usr/sbin:/usr/bin:/sbin:/bin" >> /etc/systemd/system/ospd-openvas.service 
echo "Type=forking" >> /etc/systemd/system/ospd-openvas.service 
echo "User=gvm" >> /etc/systemd/system/ospd-openvas.service 
echo "Group=gvm" >> /etc/systemd/system/ospd-openvas.service 
echo "WorkingDirectory=/opt/gvm" >> /etc/systemd/system/ospd-openvas.service 
echo "PIDFile=/opt/gvm/var/run/ospd-openvas.pid" >> /etc/systemd/system/ospd-openvas.service 
echo "ExecStart=ospd-openvas --pid-file /opt/gvm/var/run/ospd-openvas.pid --unix-socket=/opt/gvm/var/run/ospd.sock --log-file /opt/gvm/var/log/gvm/ospd-scanner.log --lock-file-dir /opt/gvm/var/run/ospd/" >> /etc/systemd/system/ospd-openvas.service 
echo "Restart=on-failure" >> /etc/systemd/system/ospd-openvas.service 
echo "RestartSec=2min" >> /etc/systemd/system/ospd-openvas.service 
echo "KillMode=process" >> /etc/systemd/system/ospd-openvas.service 
echo "KillSignal=SIGINT" >> /etc/systemd/system/ospd-openvas.service 
echo "GuessMainPID=no" >> /etc/systemd/system/ospd-openvas.service 
echo "PrivateTmp=true" >> /etc/systemd/system/ospd-openvas.service 
echo "" >> /etc/systemd/system/ospd-openvas.service 
echo "[Install]" >> /etc/systemd/system/ospd-openvas.service 
echo "WantedBy=multi-user.target" >> /etc/systemd/system/ospd-openvas.service 
systemctl daemon-reload
systemctl enable gvmd
systemctl enable gsad
systemctl enable ospd-openvas
systemctl start gvmd
systemctl start gsad
systemctl start ospd-openvas
60c905d1a31776d27fb2cc4f.name: Setup and Start Services

e663a559-7957-44fd-943a-1361e237116b.title: Upload Plugins in redis with OpenVas
